name: RollaNir 2.5D
description:
RollaNir has been upgraded from 2D to 2.5D. (3D coming soon, just sit tight!)

Roll the ball using the arrow keys or wasd keys. Jump using space. Also, look around by moving the mouse to the edges of the screen. Click to reset camera. Cool!

The goals are simple, just like in RollaNir. Roll the ball and collect coins and score multipliers to gain the highest score possible. Enjoy!
